article.title: EDO Receives Defensive Avionics Subsystem Software Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: EDO Corporation-Defense Systems of Amityville, NewÂ York, was awarded a nearly $10 million contract to provide AN/ALQ-161A Subsystem Software Deficiency Analysis and Block Cycle Support. Warner Robins Air Logistics Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
